Package it.polimi.softeng.controller

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.controller.PlayerController
public class PlayerController extends Object
Controller class that handles players generation and player utilities function

      public PlayerController()

  • Method Details

    • getTeams

      public ArrayList<Team> getTeams(ArrayList<Player> players)
      This method is used to get all the teams of the current game
      Parameters:
      players - players of the current game
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Team, all the teams currently in game

    • genPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> genPlayers(ArrayList<String> playerNames) throws InvalidPlayerNumException
      This method generates players with given names
      Parameters:
      playerNames - the names of the players of the game
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Player, the generated players
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNumException - when player number is greater than 4 or smaller than 2

    • getPlayersOnTeam

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayersOnTeam(ArrayList<Player> players, Team t)
      This method is used to know which players are from a certain team
      Parameters:
      players - all the players of the current game
      t - the team from which we want to know the players
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Player, the players from the Team t

    • getTeamColours

      public ArrayList<Colour> getTeamColours(Team t, ArrayList<Player> players)
      This method is used to calculate the combined disks present owned by a team in its players dining rooms
      Parameters:
      t - the team we want to calculate the disks from
      players - all the players of the current game
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Colour, all the disks owned by the team

    • moveStudentToDiningRoom

      public void moveStudentToDiningRoom(Player p, ArrayList<Player> players, Colour c, boolean expertMode) throws InsufficientResourceException, DiningRoomFullException
      This method is used from a player to move the students from the entrance to his dining room
      Parameters:
      p - the player who wants to move the students
      players - all the players of the current game
      c - the Colour of the disk the player wants to move to his dining room
      expertMode - true if the game is in expertMode, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - when player p doesn't have a student of the specified colour to move from their entrance
      DiningRoomFullException - when player p is trying to fill a row of the dining room that is already full

    • swapTeamTower

      public void swapTeamTower(ArrayList<Player> players, Team winningTeam, Team losingTeam, int towerNum)
      This method is used to increment/decrement the number of towers owned by a player or by a Team (case of 4-players game)
      Parameters:
      players - all the players of the current game
      winningTeam - the team that won towers
      losingTeam - the team that lost towers
      towerNum - the number of towers that got won/lost
